name: 2k17 Real Duck Hunting Adventure
description:
Ducks & Eagle are delicious but you can only crave for it if you don't know how to hunt one! Play sling-shot duck adventures now and learn projectile motions for using sling shots on hunting! With easy finger controls, im sure you can eventually adapt it into a real sling-shot and can be used for practicing!

FEATURES:

• Easy finger controls
• Tight and fast paced gameplay
• Amazing looking Graphics
• challenging unlockable stages

Download Today! :)

Leave a review and rating to let us know what you think. Your feed back is a big part in us being able to do this.
